title: Where did the term 'bogart' originate? - Quora

response.answer_text: In many of his movies, Humphrey Bogart would speak with a cigarette hanging from his mouth. This is used in the marijuana community, as in saying, “Don’t bogart that joint, my friend.” There was a country song, by that name: Lyrics Roll another one, Just like the other one. You been holding onto it, And I sure would like a hit!… Don't bogart that joint my friend,Pass it over to me!Don't bogart that joint my friend,Pass it over to me! Artist: Little Feat Album: Waiting for Columbus Released: 1978 Genres: Jamband, Classic rock
